Blog.post: yOoHoO..hErE cOme mE aGainZ..hEEzZ..( ^-^ )..i hAbEn uPdAte mY bLoG fOr a lOnG lOnG tiMe lE..hAHAhAxX..nOw aT mY cOusin hOuSe..cAnNoT sAe mUcH..kEkEkezZ..wIll uPdAt lAtA..( n_n )..CyA..Ppl..=)

**yOzZ**..jUzZ cAmE hOmE aFtEr gOiNg oUt wiF mE dE cOuSinS( cYn aNd Si YiNg) wOrZ..sO siAnZz iN tHe mOrNiNg tHEn gO oUT lOhX..aNyWaE..wE wEnT tO oRcHaRd tO eAt aNd aT fiRsT wE wAnTeD tO gO wAtCh MoViE bUt iN tHe eNd.. nOt eNoUgH sEaTs..sO diDnT wAtCh lE..**sObZz**..aFtErWhiCh..wE wEnT tO mC dOnAld aT tHe cEnTrEpOiNt tO eAt lUnCh..tiLL i bEri-tHe fUll lE..(n_n)..tHeN wE wAlKeD tO tHe pLaZa siNgaPuRa tO pLaY aRcAdE aNd toOk a sTroLL aRoUnD tHe sHoPzZ..*hEEzZ*..kKz lAhzZ..tOdAe iS nAtiOnAl dAe aNd i dUn fEEl liK wAtChiN nDp pArAdE wOrZz..sO siAnZz mAhxX..bUt lAtA gOiNg tO wAtCh s'PoRe iDoLz..sO hOw tHe cOntEsTanTs diE wOrZz...=P..i wiLL uPdAtE sOon bA..( =D)

wOw..tOdAe iS qUiTe a gOoD dAe fOr mE..aFtEr eAtiNg mY bReAkFaSt tHiS mOrniNg i wEnT tO tHe zOo wiF mY pArEnTs aNd cOuSiNzZ..sAw lOtS oF aNiMaLz tHeN wEnT tO kFc tO eAt lUnCh..aFtErWhiCh lEfT mY cOuSiNzZ..tHeY aLL tO mEeT uP wiF mY ''nEw'' pEnG yOu..aLL oF tHeM bEri fReNdLy bUt tHe gAlZz liKe bEri sHy wOrZz..diDn'T rEaLLy wAnA tOk..bUt nVm..a gOoD eXpEriEnCE fOr mE..hMm..kEeP oN wAlKiNg uP aNd dOwN..tHeN i wEnT hOmE fiRsT..wHeN i rEaCh hOMe..iMmEdiAtElY wEnT tO tAlK sHoWeR..tHeN wEnT uP tO mY uNcLe'S hOuSe tO cElEbRaTe mY aUnT'S biRtHdAe..eAt lOtS aNd lOtS oF dEliCioUS fOoD..tHeN wEnT tO tAKe lOtS aNd lOtS oF pHoToS wiF mY tHrEe oThEr cOuSiNs [Si yiNg..sHaO wEi..aNd cYn]..But tHe hAbEn tAkE uNtiL sHuAnG..tHe bAtTeRiEs nO moRe lE..tHeN nO cHoiCe wEnT bAcK uNcLe'S hOuSe..tO siNg sOnGS..*hAhAhAxX*..liStEn tO si YiNg'S vOiCe sTiLL oKaY..bUt cYn'S vOicE hOrZz..*kAoZz*..dEaF liAoZ..*lOlXx*..siNg tHe lOw pArT sO suCkY uNtiL mE aNd mY oThEr cOusiNs eArS gOiNg tO bUrSt lE..*hAhAhAhAxX*..tHeN wE chAtTEd aBoUT gOiNg oUT oN mOn..nAtiOnAl dAe..tO tAkE mOre piCzZ aNd aLsO gO wAtCh mOViE..i qUiTe lOoKinG fOrWaRd tO iT..cUz iT iS pArTy tiMe..wE cOuLd hAvE lOtS aNd LOtS oF coOl aNd mEmOriAl fUn aND lAuGhTEr...kKzZ..tHinK tHaT'S aLL fOr tOdAe lE..niCk siGniNg oFF.....=D

*yAwNzZ*..jUzZ cAmE bAcK fRm jUrOnG pOinT ..cUz i AcComPAniEd My pArEnTs..aNd cOuSinS tHeRe mAhxX..tHey aTe sO mUch tHinG bUt i diDn'T eAt aNy wOrZz..*hAhAhAxX*..nO wEi kOu mAhXx..siAnZaTiOn..nOw dOiNg nTh..qUiTe bLuR bLuR dE..sO siAnZz..dUn fEel liKe sLeEpiNg..hOwEvEr i bEri aNxiOuS oVeR tMl'S nAtiOnAl dAe cElEbRaTiOn..cUz i cAn wEaR rEd sHiRt tO sCh mAhxX..(=P) bUt tHaT bLaDdeR mS sOh aNd mS aU wAnA mAke uS sTaY bAcK tMl..fOr tHe mAtHs aNd liTeRaTURe..nOt fAiR dE..i WaNa cOmPlaiN lE..*hEExXx*..lEt mE tHinK whAt iNtEreStiNg hAbeN iN sCh tOdAe..hMmMm..tOdAe'S hiStOrY tEsT qUiTe eAsY..DiDn'T tURn oUt tO bE wHaT i eXpeCt..aNyWaE..hOPe cAn dO wEll laHz..aS fOr tHe cHinEsE teSt i toOk lAst wEek..tHe rEsUlT sTiLL aCcePtAbLe lAhz..i wAs sO sHoCkEd wHen mS sOh gAve sO mAnY hW fOr uS tO dO..liKe wAnA mUrdEr uS dE..tHeN tO mAke mAtTeRZ wOrSe..sHe sAy tHeRe'S a mAtH teSt nExT tHuRzZ..=(..aRghX..mY fOrm cHeR..tBc aLso aNnOunCeD tHaT wE wiLL bE gOiNg tO tHe s'PoRe pOlY neXt wEdNesDae..dUnO iF i sHld bE hApPi oR diSApOiNtEd..hAixX..qUiTe tiReD nOw lE..dUn wAnA tYpE aNyMoRe..hEExX..=P..wiLL uPdAtE aGaiN tMl..

jUzZ cAmE hOmE aFtEr eAtiNg mY diNnEr wOrZ..dAmN nErVoUs NoW..lAtEr gOt hiStoRy tEsT..wOnDeR iF tHe qUeStiOnS wiLL bE diFfiCuLt aNoT..*lOlXx*..GoD bLeSs mE hOrXx..( =P)..aNyWaE qUiTe siAnZz aNd tiReD nOw..cUz yEsTeRdAe sLepT bEri lAtE toO..nOw sTiLL fEeL liKe BlUr bLur..kKzZ lAhxX..uPdAte lAtEr..
